entries.content:
RESOLUTION: Terminal permissions ARE WORKING PERFECTLY!

Moti discovered that Bash/terminal was set to auto-approve (true) in settings.json!

The system was working EXACTLY as designed:
1. Claude CLI sent permission_denials for Bash tool ✅
2. PermissionChunkProcessor detected them ✅
3. Checked settings and found Bash = true (auto-approved) ✅
4. Called handleAutoApproval to silently approve ✅
5. The only error was missing chatId parameter in auto-approval path

But the CORE functionality is working:
- BashCommandPermissionMapper correctly identifies terminal commands
- Permission system detects and processes Bash permissions
- Auto-approval honors user settings

The chatId error is real but separate from the "dialog not showing" issue - that was just user settings!
